tool_description: An API that utilizes Web Scraping to gather news involving "climate"
name: EcoScrapeAPI
title: EcoScrapeAPI

api_list.name: Get Individual News
api_list.description: Gets news from a specific organization
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecoscrapeapi.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecoscrapeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ecoscrapeapi.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecoscrapeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
